Quickstride carries energon rations thanks to a pair of modified saddle bag=
s, as he shifts into beast mode.  Rattrap and Straight Shot had remained in=
 their animal forms as they mount up on Quickstride.  Just when they though=
t everyone was accounted for, a loud sneeze echoes from inside the Ark as a=
 bright light follows, then that followed by Uproar who is rubbing his nose=
 with a paw .  

" Sick or not, you guys need me.   AHHCHOO! "

Quickstride=
 steps back.

" HOW THE PIT DID YA GET OUTA THE MED BAY!?  YOU'RE SUPPOSED =
TA BE IN ISOLATION!"

Uproar sniffles.

" I skulked out when Stanton left. =
 I snuck behind 'em.  Look, I know I shouldn't have done that but, if we me=
et up with Tarantulus, he'll know how ta cure this.  Then all is good, righ=
t?"

Straight Shot shakes her head.

" I can't believe you did that.  Uproa=
r, you're gonna disperse a lot of energon out there that could result in a =
lot of damage.  It's too dangerous for you ta be out there in that conditio=
n.  Sorry but no go!  You get your furry aft back in there and get some res=
t!  NOW!"

Uproar looks to her sheepishly.

" But, you guys might need me."=


Straight Shot sighs.

" I wish you could come, but you're very sick.  You=
 have ta stay here.  Sorry but rules are rules.  If you're sick or injured =
you must stay behind for proper treatment."

The large cat groans and steps=
 back to the Ark, plopping himself down at the entrance.

" Don't worry Upr=
oar, you'll have your chance when you're fully cured."

Perpetually on the =
move and constantly busy.

 her stealthed beast mode within

ring if this jamming zone would prevent
> > her from remaining in contact w=
ith TARANTALUS or not, or whether she would

> There was a nod from LEO PRME as he accepted not o=
nly the readiness
> from HYDRAs and his men, but also from the Maximals aro=
und him as
> well.
> 
> Meanwhile CRYOTEK looked over his supplies that he =
had brought, making
> sure they were safely stowed away. Maximals and Preda=
cons no longer
> had the large volumes of subspace 'room' that that used to=
 be enjoyed
> by the Autobots and Decepticons before the great reduction. H=
owever he
> was still ready. He was basically carrying extra rations of ene=
rgon as
> well as basic repair supplies and tools he might need to cut and
=
> splice with. It was not much, but it would do in a pinch.
> 
> "I have th=
e co-ordinates." SANTON said as he held up the device. At a
> nod from LEO =
he began to read them, "320.25 by 7218.60 Vector 187."
> His words were coo=
l and calm as he read them off.
> 
> "Everyone have them?" LEO said as he l=
ooked around. "You fliers are
> going to have to stay in the air, while we =
ground pounders are going
> to be here inside the jungle. We will be headin=
g for the same
> location."
> 
> LEO PRIME straightened, "Maximals, MAXIMIZ=
E!" he said as he shifed
> into his beast mode, that of a yellow and brown =
lion, his roar echoing
> across the jungle, and at the same time the Fuzors=
, SANTON and WING
> CALIBER changed form as well.
> 
> "Noctorro, Airhammer=
, Wing Caliber try to keep an optic on us from the
> air, but if you loose =
sight of us, get to that location and try to
> free the others. You know th=
e mission. "
> 
> LEO PRIME's voice was nothing if not deep and more resona=
nt. "Any
> further and we will loose communications. Does anyone have any o=
ther
> questions before we head in?"
> 
> SKY SHADOW had watched silent all=
 this in silence, his optics on
> HYDRAS and LEO PRIME. He did said nothing=
 to LEO, instead he whispered
> his own orders into his radio, his voice wh=
isper silent, his own
> rations carefully stowed away.
> 
> (TAG)

ton

><br>
> For the moment =
VICE GRIP listened over in the underbrush, staying qwuiet as<br>
> CRYOT=
EK went over the list of equipemtn they had brought along.<br>
><br>
&gt=
; DINOBOT merely smiling over in his beast mode, but still not stating his<=
br>
> identification codes as he was referred to.<br>
><br>
> At t=
his point, BLACKARACHNIA continued up in her stealthed beast mode within<br=
>
> the jungle canopy, taking another scan of the equipment CRYOTEK and =
HYDRAS<br>
> had brought along wtih them, pondering if this jamming zone=
 would prevent<br>
> her from remaining in contact with TARANTALUS or no=
t, or whether she would<br>
> have a period of freedom wtihin it.<br>
<b=
r>
<NEW><br>
<br>
There was a nod from LEO PRME as he accepted not on=
ly the readiness<br>
from HYDRAs and his men, but also from the Maximals ar=
ound him as<br>
well.<br>
<br>
Meanwhile CRYOTEK looked over his supplies t=
hat he had brought, making<br>
sure they were safely stowed away. Maximals =
and Predacons no longer<br>
had the large volumes of subspace 'room' that t=
hat used to be enjoyed<br>
by the Autobots and Decepticons before the great=
 reduction. However he<br>
was still ready. He was basically carrying extra=
 rations of energon as<br>
well as basic repair supplies and tools he might=
 need to cut and<br>
splice with. It was not much, but it would do in a pin=
ch.<br>
<br>
"I have the co-ordinates." SANTON said as he held up the devic=
e. At a<br>
nod from LEO he began to read them, "320.25 by 7218.60 Vector 1=
87."<br>
His words were cool and calm as he read them off.<br>
<br>
"Everyo=
ne have them?" LEO said as he looked around. "You fliers are<br>
going to h=
ave to stay in the air, while we ground pounders are going<br>
to be here i=
nside the jungle. We will be heading for the same<br>
location."<br>
<br>
L=
EO PRIME straightened, "Maximals, MAXIMIZE!" he said as he shifed<br>
into =
his beast mode, that of a yellow and brown lion, his roar echoing<br>
acros=
s the jungle, and at the same time the Fuzors, SANTON and WING<br>
CALIBER =
changed form as well.<br>
<br>
"Noctorro, Airhammer, Wing Caliber try to ke=
ep an optic on us from the<br>
air, but if you loose sight of us, get to th=
at location and try to<br>
free the others. You know the mission. "<br>
<br=
>
LEO PRIME's voice was nothing if not deep and more resonant. "Any<br>
fur=
ther and we will loose communications. Does anyone have any other<br>
quest=
ions before we head in?"<br>
<br>
SKY SHADOW had watched silent all this in=
 silence, his optics on<br>
HYDRAS and LEO PRIME. He did said nothing to LE=
O, instead he whispered<br>
his own orders into his radio, his voice whispe=
r silent, his own<br>
rations carefully stowed away.<br>

Preston<br>
